meanings.sent1: The wound was suppurating, oozing yellow pus.
meanings.sent2: The infected cut was suppurating and needed medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The suppurating wound made the doctor recommend antibiotics.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was suppurating inside her, ready to explode.
meanings.sent5: The suppurating sore was a clear sign of infection.

meanings.definition: To undergo the formation of pus
meanings.sent1: After the insect bite, his skin started suppurating.
meanings.sent2: The pimple was suppurating, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The suppurating zit was impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent4: His frustration was suppurating, waiting to burst out.
meanings.sent5: The suppurating wound was a painful reminder of the accident.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the formation of pus
meanings.sent1: The suppurating wound was infected and needed treatment.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the suppurating sore as a sign of infection.
meanings.sent3: The suppurating pimple was impossible to hide.
meanings.sent4: Her suppurating anger was evident in her clenched fists.
meanings.sent5: The suppurating wound was a concerning sight.
